author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Paulson & Co Ups Share Stake In Discovery, Endo International
text:
May 15 (Reuters) - Paulson & Co Inc :
* PAULSON & CO INC CUTS SHARE STAKE IN VISTRA ENERGY CORP TO 3.7 MILLION SHARES FROM 10 MILLION SHARES - SEC FILING
* PAULSON & CO INC UPS SHARE STAKE IN ENDO INTERNATIONAL BY 27.9 PERCENT TO 9.2 MILLION SHARES
* PAULSON & CO INC UPS SHARE STAKE IN DISCOVERY INC TO 4.2 MILLION SERIES C SHARES FROM 1 MILLION SERIES C SHARES
* PAULSON & CO INC DISSOLVES SHARE STAKE IN XCERRA CORP * PAULSON & CO INC - CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF MARCH 31, 2018 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF DEC 31, 2017 Source For the quarter ended Mar 31, 2018: bit.ly/2L4RUD2 Source For the quarter ended Dec 31, 2017: bit.ly/2ELf1lJ
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
